name: Chopper
description:
Chopper is an iOS video game developed by Majic Jungle Software and released on April 5, 2009. The sequel, Chopper 2, was released on July 27, 2010. The game "is a total evolution from the first episode: better graphic, more missions, more variety".
As of 2 February 2018, the app is removed from App Store and Mac App Store
